body:
Hi Mark,


Thanks for finding (and fixing!) this bug, which I inadvertently  
introduced while changing the square sampling to disk sampling.  I've  
checked the change into CVS, which should show up in the HEAD in a day  
or two.


Cheers,
-Greg
